_a-0000ee52-8983-8000-9ba6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_GetDocumentMetadata

_a-0000ec2d-5396-8000-9bdc-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extraction_GetInstanceById
_a-0000ec2d-5396-8000-9bdc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
  recordType: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance,
  identifier: ri!identifier,
  fields: a!flatten(
    {
      /* Extraction Instance */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersionId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.documentId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.statusId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.hasBoundingBoxes,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.boundingBoxesDocumentId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.validationErrors,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.accuracy,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.precision,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.f1,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.recall,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.createdOn,
      /* Extraction Fields */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.modelVersionFieldId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.extractedValue,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.overrideValue,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.overrideNull,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.boundingBox,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.confidence,
      /* Extraction Fields > Rows */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.overrideValue,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.boundingBox,
      /* Extraction Fields > Rows > Cells */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.cells.modelVersionFieldId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.cells.extractedValue,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.cells.overrideValue,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.cells.overrideNull,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.cells.confidence,
      /* Extraction Fields > Model Field */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.modelVersionField.key,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.modelVersionField.columns.key,
      /* Extraction Fields > Rows > Cells > Column */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.cells.column.key,
      a!defaultValue(ri!additionalFields, {})
    },
    
  )
)

_a-0000e79d-2c73-8000-97b9-01ef9001ef90_.name: SHRD_Merge

_a-0000ed69-99d8-8000-9ba6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extraction_ShouldConvertToPdf
_a-0000ed69-99d8-8000-9ba6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
or(
  /* Do convert if:
     - No document, just text input
     - Document using sections with rules
 
     Do not convert if: 
     - Document is a pdf
     - Document is a csv
     - Document is any of the supported types (png, tif, jpg) 
       and CONVERT FLAG is true
       and autoRotate (which requires PDF) is not true
     - Document is eml 
       and we aren't using Advanced IDP
  */
  not(
    and(
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!inputDoc),
      or(
        rule!AIA_DocIsPdf(
          document: ri!inputDoc
        ),
        rule!AIA_IsDocumentExtension(
          document: ri!inputDoc,
          extensions: "csv"
        ),
        rule!AIA_IsDocumentExtension(
          document: ri!inputDoc,
          extensions: "xml"
        ),
        and(
          cons!AIA_FLAG_CONVERT_IMAGES,
          rule!AIA_IsDocumentExtension(
            document: ri!inputDoc,
            extensions: cons!AIA_AI_SUPPORTED_DOC_TYPES
          ),
          ri!ModelVersion[recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.extractionModel.useAutoRotation] <> true
        ),
        and(
          rule!AIA_IsDocumentExtension(
            document: ri!inputDoc,
            extensions: "eml"
          ),
          and(
            ri!ModelVersion[recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.extractionModel.useAdvancedLayout] <> true,
            ri!ModelVersion[recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.extractionModel.useBoundingBoxes] <> true
          )
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  and(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!inputDoc),
    a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!inputText)
  ),
  a!isNotNullOrEmpty(reject(fn!isnull, ri!ModelVersion[recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.sections.rule]))   
)

_a-0000ee35-0ca2-8000-9ba6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_LogMetric

_a-0000ee94-7472-8000-9bb4-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extraction_GetConfidenceForIds

_a-0000eea0-7c7f-8000-9bce-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_PLG_QueryFile
_a-0000eea0-7c7f-8000-9bce-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
with(
  local!result: queryfile(
    ri!document,
    ri!outputFormat,
    now(),
    ri!jsonPath
  ),
  local!result.result
)

_a-0000ee6e-3b90-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_IsExtractionInstance

_a-0000e79d-2c73-8000-97b9-01ef9001ef90_.name: SHRD_MergeInner

_a-0000eea3-15ee-8000-9bd4-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_UTIL_SetRecordFields

_a-0000ee3d-1f5c-8000-9ba4-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_FormatValueForDatabase
_a-0000ee3d-1f5c-8000-9ba4-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!field[recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version Field.type],
  whenTrue: a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!value),
  then: ri!value,
  whenTrue: contains(
    index(cons!AIA_EXTRACTION_FIELD_TYPES, {4,5}),
    fv!value
  ),
  then: rule!AIA_ConvertDateToIso(
    value: if(
      runtimetypeof(ri!value) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
      rule!AIA_TypeHelper(
        value: ri!value,
        field: ri!field
      ),
      ri!value
    )
  ),
  default: ri!value
)

_a-0000ec44-cb49-8000-9be6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_TypeHelper
_a-0000ec44-cb49-8000-9be6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!convertedValue: a!match(
    value: ri!field[recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version Field.type],
    equals: cons!AIA_EXTRACTION_FIELD_TYPES[1],
    then: trim(ri!value),
    equals: cons!AIA_EXTRACTION_FIELD_TYPES[2],
    then: tointeger(ri!value),
    equals: cons!AIA_EXTRACTION_FIELD_TYPES[3],
    then: todecimal(ri!value),
    equals: cons!AIA_EXTRACTION_FIELD_TYPES[4],
    then: try(
      if(
        find("Z", ri!value) > 0,
        rule!AIA_ConvertIsoToDate(value: ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!datetime: parsedate(trim(ri!value)),
          date(year(local!datetime), month(local!datetime), day(local!datetime))
        )
      ),
      ri!value
    ),
    equals: cons!AIA_EXTRACTION_FIELD_TYPES[5],
    then: try(
      if(
        find("Z", ri!value) > 0,
        rule!AIA_ConvertIsoToDate(value: ri!value),
        parsedate(trim(ri!value))
      ),
      ri!value
    ),
    equals: cons!AIA_EXTRACTION_FIELD_TYPES[6],
    then: a!match(
      value: trim(lower(ri!value)),
      whenTrue: or(
        ri!value = "yes",
        toboolean(fv!value),
      ),
      then: true,
      whenTrue: or(
        ri!value = "no",
        ri!value = "false"
      ),
      then: false,
      default: trim(ri!value)
    ),
    equals: cons!AIA_EXTRACTION_FIELD_TYPES[8],
    then: trim(ri!value),
    default: trim(ri!value)
  ),
  if(
    and(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(local!convertedValue),
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!value)
    ),
    ri!value,
    local!convertedValue
  )
)

_a-0000ee21-294f-8000-9bb6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_ShouldRotateDoc

_a-0000ec5c-9eda-8000-9bec-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extraction_GetModelVersionById

_a-0000ecf1-11b9-8000-9c4e-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_EXTRACTION_MODEL_VERSION_FIELDS
_a-0000ecf1-11b9-8000-9c4e-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
{
  /* Base */
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.status,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.updates,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.role,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.instructions,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.modelId,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.versionId,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.llm,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.useAiReview,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.aiReviewLlm,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.aiReviewRole,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.aiReviewInstructions,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.useConfidence,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.confidenceThreshold,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.useSampling,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.samplingRate,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.instanceCount,
  /* Fields */
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.sectionId,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.section,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.order,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.key,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.label,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.type,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.isMultiple,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.description,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.instructions,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.extractionType,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.optionRule,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.validationRule,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.extractionRule,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.postProcessRule,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.required,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.useVision,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.isHidden,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.isNotTracked,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.useAiReview,
  /* Columns */
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.order,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.key,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.label,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.type,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.isMultiple,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.isHidden,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.isNotTracked,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.description,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.instructions,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.extractionType,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.optionRule,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.validationRule,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.extractionRule,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.postProcessRule,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.required,
  /* Examples */
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.examples,
  /* Sections */
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.sections.name,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.sections.description,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.sections.rule,
  /* Validation Rules */
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.validationRules.name,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.validationRules.message,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.validationRules.severity,
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.validationRules.validations,
  /* Extraction Model */
  recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.extractionModel,
}

_a-0000ee21-294f-8000-9bb6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_PLG_WriteFile

_a-0000ecf1-11b9-8000-9c4e-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Test_GetLatestExtractionInstanceWithFields

_a-0000ec2d-5396-8000-9bdc-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Test_GetLatestExtractionInstance
_a-0000ec2d-5396-8000-9bdc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AIA_Extraction_GetInstanceById(
  identifier: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordType_v3"(
    recordType: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance,
    pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
      startIndex: 1,
      batchSize: 1,
      sort: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
          field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.id
        )
      }
    )
  ).data[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.id],
  additionalFields: {
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.instanceUuid,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersion.versionId,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersion.modelId,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersion.uuid,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersion.extractionModel.key,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.documentFolderId,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fieldCount,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.sections,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.boundingBoxes,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.responseDocumentId,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.sourceDocumentId
  }
)

_a-0000ee3e-060c-8000-9bb8-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extraction_KeepXSpans

_a-0000ec60-a08d-8000-9bee-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extraction_CreateUpdateInstance
_a-0000ec60-a08d-8000-9bee-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AIA_UTIL_SetRecordFields(
  record: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!ExtractionInstance,
    default: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance()
  ),
  neverOverwrite: {
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.documentFolderId,
      value: ri!folder
    ),
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.documentId,
      value: if(tointeger(ri!convertedDoc) > 0, ri!convertedDoc, null)
    ),
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.sourceDocumentId,
      value: if(tointeger(ri!inputDoc) > 0, ri!inputDoc, null)
    ),
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.inputText,
      value: ri!inputText
    ),
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersionId,
      value: ri!modelVersionId
    ),
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.testSuiteRunId,
      value: ri!testSuiteRunId,
      applyWhen: and(
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!testSuiteRunId),
        ri!testSuiteRunId <> 0
      )
    ),
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.testRunProcessId,
      value: ri!testRunProcessId
    ),
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.createdOn,
      value: now()
    ),
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.createdBy,
      value: ri!initiator
    ),
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.responseDocumentId,
      value: if(
        a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!responseJson),
        null,
        rule!AIA_PLG_WriteFile(
          content: ri!responseJson,
          name: "response",
          extension: "json",
          folder: ri!ExtractionInstance[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.documentFolderId]
        ).document
      )
    ),
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.pageCount,
      value: rule!AIA_GetPageCount(
        document: a!defaultValue(
          ri!ExtractionInstance[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.documentId],
          ri!convertedDoc,
          ri!inputDoc
        )
      )
    ),
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields,
      value: if(
        /*if there are no response passed in, this is liekyl being called before actual extraction save step*/
        /*so can skip logic*/
        /*intended to skip this logic when rule is called in intiate extraction and places like that where rest of rule is needed but extraction is not complete*/
        a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!responseJson),
        null,
        rule!AIA_Extract_ExtractFieldsFromJsonResponse(
          jsonResponse: ri!responseJson,
          ExtractionInstance: ri!ExtractionInstance
        ).extractedFields
      )
    )
  },
  alwaysOverwrite: {
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.testInstance,
      value: a!defaultValue(
        if(
          a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!isDocumentTestCase),
          ri!ExtractionInstance[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.testInstance],
          ri!isDocumentTestCase
        ),
        false()
      )
    ),
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modifiedOn,
      value: now()
    ),
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modifiedBy,
      value: a!defaultValue(
        value: ri!initiator,
        default: loggedInUser()
      )
    ),
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.statusId,
      value: a!match(
        value: ri!ExtractionInstance[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.statusId],
        equals: cons!AIA_INSTANCE_STATUS_RECONCILED_MANUALLY,
        equals: cons!AIA_INSTANCE_STATUS_RECONCILED_AUTOMATICALLY,
        then: fv!value,
        equals: cons!AIA_INSTANCE_STATUS_EXTRACTED,
        then: fv!value,
        whenTrue: and(
          tointeger(fv!value) = cons!AIA_INSTANCE_STATUS_INITIATED,
          a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!responseJson)
        ),
        then: cons!AIA_INSTANCE_STATUS_EXTRACTED,
        default: cons!AIA_INSTANCE_STATUS_INITIATED
      )
    ),
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.inputTokens,
      value: a!defaultValue(
        ri!ExtractionInstance[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.inputTokens],
        0
      ) + a!defaultValue(ri!inputTokens, 0)
    ),
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.outputTokens,
      value: a!defaultValue(
        ri!ExtractionInstance[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.outputTokens],
        0
      ) + a!defaultValue(ri!outputTokens, 0)
    ),
    a!map(
      field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.isSamplingRequired,
      value: false,
      applyWhen: ri!isReconciliation = true()
    )
  }
)

000dec67-1fdf-8000-019a-7f0000014e7a.name: AIA Initiate Extraction

_a-0000ec2d-5396-8000-9bdc-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extract_ExtractFieldsFromJsonResponse

_a-0000ee21-294f-8000-9bb6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_IsDocumentExtension

_a-0000ec44-cb49-8000-9be6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extraction_GetLatestModelVersionIdByKey

_a-0000ed69-99d8-8000-9ba6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extraction_ShouldRunAdvancedIdp
_a-0000ed69-99d8-8000-9ba6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
and(
  cons!AIA_ADVANCED_IDP_ENABLED,
  or(
    ri!ExtractionInstance[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersion.extractionModel.useAdvancedLayout] = true,
    ri!ExtractionInstance[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersion.extractionModel.useBoundingBoxes] = true
  ),
  or(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!useAdvancedIdp),
    ri!useAdvancedIdp = true
  ),
  rule!AIA_IsDocumentExtension(
    document: ri!ExtractionInstance[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.documentId],
    extensions: cons!AIA_AI_SUPPORTED_DOC_TYPES
  ) 
)

_a-0000ee3d-1f5c-8000-9ba4-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_FormatValuesForDatabase

_a-0001ee05-5006-8000-9ba7-011c48011c48_.name: SHRD_ArrayKeepXEntries
_a-0001ee05-5006-8000-9ba7-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
=if(
  and(
    a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!array),
    a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!numToKeep),
    ri!numToKeep > 0,
    count(ri!array) > ri!numToKeep
  ),
  rdrop(
    ri!array,
    count(ri!array) - ri!numToKeep
  ),
  ri!array
)

_a-0000ec1e-9975-8000-9bd6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extraction_GetFieldsForModelVersionId
_a-0000ec1e-9975-8000-9bd6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
  recordType: recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version,
  identifier: ri!modelVersionId,
  fields: a!flatten(
    {
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.modelVersionId,
  
      /* Fields */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.sectionId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.section,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.order,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.key,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.label,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.type,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.isMultiple,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.description,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.instructions,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.extractionType,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.optionRule,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.validationRule,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.extractionRule,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.postProcessRule,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.required,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.useVision,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.isHidden,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.isNotTracked,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.useAiReview,
  
      /* Fields > Column */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.fieldId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.label,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.key,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.optionRule,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.validationRule,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.postProcessRule,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.isHidden,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.isNotTracked,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.type,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.extractionType,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.required,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.description,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.instructions,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields.columns.accuracy,
      a!defaultValue(ri!additionalFields, {})
    },
  ),
  relatedRecordData: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_relatedRecordData"(
      relationship: recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields,
      sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
        field: recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version Field.order,
        ascending: true
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_relatedRecordData"(
      relationship: recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields,
      sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
        field: recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version Field.order,
        ascending: true
      )
    )
  }
)[recordType!AIA Extraction Model Version.fields]

_a-0000ee6e-3b90-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_CreateValidation

_a-0000ec2d-5396-8000-9bdc-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_ExtractJson

_a-0000ee21-294f-8000-9bb6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_NameFromInput
AIA_Extraction_AddTokens

_a-0000e79d-2c73-8000-97b9-01ef9001ef90_.name: SHRD_Update
